body: after the incidents today one of the lobbies are whitelisted and not letting 90% of everyone join the server. is there a way to directly connect to a rotation or lobby so you can go on the server or for convenience hope straight into a game without waiting 2 minutes for everything to load in
body_tagged: after the incidents today one of the lobbies are whitelisted and not letting 90% of everyone join the server. is there a way to directly connect to a rotation or lobby so you can go on the server or for convenience hope straight into a game without waiting 2 minutes for everything to load in
title: Direct Server Connections?

replies.body: No, sorry. The server is listed for some Staff to fix some problems that were occuring. I think you can access beta.avic.us, though.
replies.body_tagged: No, sorry. The server is listed for some Staff to fix some problems that were occuring. I think you can access beta.avic.us, though.
